name: Santa-Bear 2022
description:
NOTE: THIS GAME ORIGINATES FROM THE GAME - Enviro-Bear 2000

Features:

1. Santa Bears!

2. Christmas Fish!

3. Christmas Badgers!

4. The eternal cycle of Nature!

How to Play:

1. Grab stuff with your finger.

2. Eat Christmas fish and berries.

3. When you are FAT enough, drive in a cave to eat milk and cookies!

4. You can throw stuff out of your windows and sunroof!
